Class Reservation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Reservation

  • public class Reservation
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Reservation added to the System. A Guest can make 0 to multiple Reservations.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Li Jin Quan, Lee Jian Hao, Chen Xing Yu, Kok Jia Hui

    • Nested Class Summary

      static class  Reservation.ReservationStatus
      The list of Status for Reservation.

                   java.lang.String pax,
                   Reservation.ReservationStatus reserveStatus,
                   java.lang.String guestIC)
        Reservation Constructor.
        Parameters:
        reservationId - This Reservation ID.
        roomId - This room ID.
        guestName - This Guest's name.
        creditCard - This Guest's credit card detail
        checkInDate - This Guest's intended check in date.
        checkOutDate - This Guest's intended check out date.
        pax - The number of people staying in the Guest's room.
        reserveStatus - The Reservation Status of the Guest's reservation.
        guestIC - The Guest's Identity Card number.
